text: 5000 (five thousand) is a natural number between 4999 and 5001. It is also halfway of 10000. ==Roman Numerals== In Roman Numerals, 5000 is written as a V with the line on top. ==List of Factors of 5000== The factors of 5000 are: 1, 2, 4, 5, 8, 10, 20, 25, 40, 50, 100, 125, 200, 250, 500, 625, 1000, 1250, 2500 and 5000. Category:Integers
title: 5000 (number)
